title.v: Khóa số liệu cho nhiều người sử dụng

command.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000) select @ma_ct = left(replace(@ma_ct, ' ', ''), 1024)
select top 0 user_id, ma_ct into #ks from dmctks2
set @q = 'insert into #ks select a.id as user_id, b.ma_ct from vsysuserinfo a cross join dmct b' set @q = @q + ' where a.admin = 0 and a.user_yn = 1 and a.status = ''1'' and ma_ct in (''' + replace(replace(@ma_ct, '''', ''''''), ',', ''',''') + ''')' exec sp_executesql @q
update dmctks2 set ngay_ks = @ngay_ks from dmctks2 a join #ks b on a.user_id = b.user_id and a.ma_ct = b.ma_ct update dmctks set ngay_ks = @ngay_ks from dmctks a join #ks b on a.user_id = b.user_id and a.ma_ct = b.ma_ct
insert into dmctks2(user_id, ma_ct, ngay_ks) select a.user_id, a.ma_ct, @ngay_ks from #ks a left join dmctks2 b on a.user_id = b.user_id and a.ma_ct = b.ma_ct where b.user_id is null and b.ma_ct is null insert into dmctks(user_id, ma_ct, ngay_ks) select a.user_id, a.ma_ct, @ngay_ks from #ks a left join dmctks b on a.user_id = b.user_id and a.ma_ct = b.ma_ct where b.user_id is null and b.ma_ct is null
drop table #ks
